title: Luxury Little Italy 3 Bedroom With Washer/Dryer In Unit
posting_body: ['Brand New renovated 3 bedroom apartment features a marble bathroom, washer & dryer, and granite kitchen with dishwasher.', 'Exposed brick, and hardwood floors.', 'A perfect space for entertaining.', 'Available for July 1 occupancy.', 'This residence features:', '• Granite Counter-tops', '•Stainless Steel Appliances with Dishwasher', '•Marble bathroom', '•In-unit washer/dryer', '•Ample closet space', '•Hardwood floors', '•Exposed brick.', '-High Ceilings', 'Located just steps from great shopping, and highly acclaimed restaurants and shopping including Balthazar, Bread, and Supreme.', 'Conveniently located just moments away to several subway lines, including the 6, B D, F, M, N, and R trains.', 'Pictures are representative of quality and type of renovation, not an indication of size or layout.', 'APARTMENT FEATURES', 'Washer / Dryer', 'High Ceilings', 'Exposed Bricks', 'KITCHEN', 'Dishwasher', 'Stainless Steel Appliances', 'Microwave', 'Countertops [Granite]', 'BATHROOM', 'Marble', 'BUILDING DESCRIPTION', 'Pre-war', 'Built 1910', 'Low-rise', '5 Floors', '8 Apartments', 'Walk-Up', 'Voice Intercom', 'BUILDING POLICIES', 'Insurent Allowed', 'TheGuarantors Allowed', 'Shares Allowed', 'BUILDING PET POLICY', 'Pets Allowed.', 'Case By Case.']
